posts.cooked:
Weâ€™re releasing the Signal 7.63 beta soon.

If youâ€™re interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Using Obtanium? Remember to opt-in for pre-release tags to receive beta updates.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

  • Split-screen UI for large screen devices
  • Create group - large screen support
  • More backup fixes

Complete list of new commits since 7.62.3:
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.62.3â€¦main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Comparing v7.62.3...main Â· signalapp/Signal-Android Â· GitHub
Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.62 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.63.0 (160800)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

63 new commits since 7.62.3:

Show commits

  • Update local inapppayment cancelation state to match that of the activesubscription when we discover it. [1]

  • Create group v2 - Implement navigation to group details screen. [2]

  • Enable split pane UI for create group screen. [3]

  • Ignore message backups checkout activity tests. [4]

  • Do not update status bar or nav bar coloring if large screen support is enabled. [5]

  • Ignore call to visibility if there's no view. [6]

  • Validate attachment key size. [7]

  • Downgrade warning log during backup creation. [8]

  • Fix time pattern matching for emoji search. [9]

    Fixes #14391

  • Bump to libsignal v0.85.1 [10]

  • Fix bug related to in-memory jobs not being prioritized properly. [11]

  • Suppor tmore pasted image types. [12]

  • Fix color of caption button. [13]

  • Fix call requests to a PNI. [14]

  • Fix screenshot protection on details screen. [15]

    Fixes #14397

  • Deselect active item when in full-screen pane. [16]

  • Fix quoting file-only messages. [17]

  • Update archive processors with consistent naming scheme. [18]

  • Fix validation error with chat folder export. [19]

  • Fix collapsed keyboard inset. [20]

  • Do not attempt to re-upload known-bad backup files. [21]

  • Increase extended partition width to 24dp. [22]

  • Optimize padding block size based on real world experience. [23]

  • Improve backup import resilience for duplicate messages. [24]

  • Fix tap areas in stories viewer. [25]

  • Fix logo color and sizing in empty screen. [26]

  • Utilize an effect to initialize the current anchor. [27]

  • Set initial anchor index. [28]

  • Fix update of windowsizeclass. [29]

  • Fix NPE when slide URI is null. [30]

  • Fix two pane layout positioning and sizing. [31]

  • Fix long text rendering as attachment bug. [32]

  • Address validation error around calls with invalid ringers. [33]

  • Temporarily disable 7 day backup warning. [34]

  • Add more safety checks to e164 conversion in backup export. [35]

  • Show toast when ignoring backup enable megaphone. [36]

  • Fix incorrect attachment archive state after changing remote key after upload. [37]

  • Set pane role when we move to a fullscreen anchor. [38]

  • AppScaffold Animation Performance impromements. [39]

  • Fix story shared element transition on foldables. [40]

  • Add read support for binary service ids. [41]

  • Remove mock web server and prevent libsignal from connecting for android tests. [42]

  • Fix potential thread conflict in backup import. [43]

  • Delete attachment transfer files after restore or download. [44]

  • Reimplement conversation action mode to not use system actionmode. [45]

  • Utilize edgeToEdge instead of fullscreen helper. [46]

  • Add various backup fixes for polls. [47]

  • Preserve pane expansion state across window size class changes. [48]

  • Show deprecation notice for API 21. [49]

  • Clear recipient remap cache on restore. [50]

  • Increment largeScreenUI feature flag. [51]

  • Update support logic for large screens. [52]

  • Fix list action mode exit on back. [53]

  • Fail gracefully when crash occurs during backup restore. [54]

  • Fix OOM during backup export. [55]

  • Prevent wallpaper archive thumbnail generation. [56]

  • Report first render to main activity within nav hosts. [57]

  • Convert private story settings fragment to compose. [58]

  • Update vote logic for poll percentages. [59]

  • Fix action mode back handling in conversation fragment. [60]

  • Bump protocol version number for polls. [61]

  • Update translations and other static files. [62]

  • Bump version to 7.63.0 [63]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.62.3â€¦v7.63.0

Localization changes

Split-screen UI for large screen devices

posts.name: Clayton Burns
posts.cooked:
Love the split UI! Looks awesome on my Pixel 9 Pro Fold.

image1660Ã—1721 112 KB

Any chance we could get more split granularity? This is the only option for split, and you can drag the conversation list to fill, or the conversation panel to fill. Would like to see a 50/50 option, maybe a 90/10 that shrinks the conversation list to only contact pictures.

Still love what it is currently!

alex-signal:

Everyone should see some fancy new animations regardless

I had to force stop and clear cache to see any changes, but the predictive back gesture animation is awesome!!

My only tiny nitpick is that it seems the animation is less smooth than the stock animation youâ€™d see when exiting an app for example. I canâ€™t quite determine why, but maybe there are less steps, or too much movement in between each step?

Itâ€™s especially noticeable when moving very slowly

Just wanted to update and say this update allowed me to restore my backup itâ€™s restoring media now so I will update if anything goes wrong but seems to be all good now

posts.name: Alex Hart
posts.cooked:
Salt505:

My only tiny nitpick is that it seems the animation is less smooth than the stock animation youâ€™d see when exiting an app for example. I canâ€™t quite determine why, but maybe there are less steps, or too much movement in between each step?

That animation was painful to write and Iâ€™ve done my best to optimize the heck out of it but there is room for improvement. I dunno if itâ€™s the bezier curve that is being used or what but it definitely does â€œskipâ€ steps (doesnâ€™t run at 60fps) and Iâ€™m not sure why at this point.

The Stories button is not really visible on my Pixel 7 in landscape mode. I switched to Stories and turned my phone an then saw this tiny gray bar at the bottom. Tapping there does trigger the button

Screenshot_20251029-2107222400Ã—1080 65.1 KB

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.63.0/f7d0ee66f6d52d6e5a5b52d955c7f198a3bf016f128b21b4534dc2027838b450

I have a problem Iâ€™ve first noticed in 7.62.3 where a picture sent to me will rotate 90 degrees in the wrong direction when opened. This behavior persists in 7.63.0.

The picture contains peopleâ€™s faces, so I donâ€™t feel comfortable sharing it publicly, but if interested, I will provide a screen recording of the issue to anyone from the Signal team.

posts.name: Nix (N1X)
posts.cooked:
I opted-out and in, and that worked this time I also disabled everything except release title version as string + reconsile version.

Thanks guys

Should the new back animation work only to the conversation list or also into chats themselves?

Follow these steps

  1. Share an image to a chat
  2. Switch back to the app the image was shared from, do not use back in signal first
  3. Go to homescreen
  4. Open Signal, the chat is briefly visible before it fades to the conversation list
  5. Use back gesture and you move to the chat

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.63.0/c0d6f60c3d9474e097be0fafc832c69f8f25048c1a72c234ad0ffa8bc0d67952

posts.name: Mat
posts.cooked:
Iâ€™m not sure if this happened in this release, but I think so. The background of the navigation bar is no longer matching the button bar if Signal (it still does inside chats but not in the chat list). Maybe something the new split screen view causes.

Edit: Nevermind, it seems this was a one time thing, itâ€™s back to normal now.

Screenshot_20251030-0851101080Ã—815 25.9 KB

Edit 2: It seems like the sticker menu breaks something. When using it, the bar does no longer match the colour in the chat list (until restarted). Also, the stickers are then in columns of only two instead of four (see video, the link works for 48hrs, I couldnâ€™t upload it here directly).
